invoice.invoice_cancel_info: Invoice has been Cancelled and no action can be performed.
invoice.error_summary_fetch: Error Occurred while fetching record detail summary
invoice.reviseInvoice_description: If you choose to proceed, the invoice will undergo revision,resulting in the creation of a new record. The previous record will move to a revised state. This action is irreversible.
invoice.cancelInvoice_description: If you choose to proceed, the invoice will be canceled and no more actions can be made to that Invoice. This action is irreversible.
invoice.empty_version_history: It seems that there are no Invoice history
